label: Q4 2021
title: Chain4Travel AG Founded
text: Team formation and the start of development

label: Q2 2022
title: Columbus Testnet Launch
text: Development of the first B2B decentralized travel applications

label: Q3 2022
title: Private Pre-Sale of Camino Token
text: Closing the pre-sale with 4.6M CHF from 300+ entities

title: Initial Exchange Offering (IEO)
text: Focus on the ecosystem's growth with new use cases and increased transactions before listing

label: Q4 2024
title: Camino Messenger PoC
text: Presentation of the first p2p messenger for the travel industry and its further development.

label: Q3 2023
title: Establishment of the Camino Network Foundation
text: The Foundation is set up to lead the future development of the decentralized network

label: Q2 2023
title: Camino Network Mainnet Launch
text: Soft launch of the mainnet in several stages. First dApps deployed on Camino Network

label: Q1 2024
title: Camino Messenger Testnet
text: 'Berlin' phase deployment with a beta version of Camino Messenger

label: Q2 2024
title: Camino Messenger Live
text: Cross-chain communication and distribution via Camino Messenger

label: Q3 2024
title: Block Explorer 2.0
text: Enhanced user experience to intuitively navigate through the web3 travel ecosystem

label: Q4 2024
title: Camino Wallet 2.0
text: Introduction of new features and improved UX/UI
